name: lever-scope
description: レバー位置可視化アプリケーション

scripts.build: npm run build:win && npm run build:mac
scripts.build:win: npm run build:http:win && npm run build:bridge:win && npm run build:api
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:http:mac && npm run build:bridge:mac && npm run build:api
scripts.statics: npm run build:app && npm run copy-assets && npm run bundle-static
scripts.build:http:win: mkdir -p ../app/Windows && npm run statics && BUNDLE_MODE=true bun build ./dist/http-server.js --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile ../app/Windows/LeverHTTP.exe
scripts.build:http:mac: mkdir -p ../app/macOS && npm run statics && BUNDLE_MODE=true bun build ./dist/http-server.js --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile ../app/macOS/LeverHTTP
scripts.build:http:nobundle: npm run build:http:nobundle:win && npm run build:http:nobundle:mac
scripts.build:bridge: npm run build:bridge:win && npm run build:bridge:mac
scripts.build:api:win32: cd ../LeverAPI && python -m PyInstaller --onefile --collect-submodules=dns --hidden-import=engineio.async_drivers.threading --hidden-import=api.discovery --hidden-import=api.device_manager --hidden-import=api.transformers --hidden-import=api.cache --collect-all=orjson --name LeverAPI app.py && copy /Y dist\LeverAPI.exe ..\app\Windows\
scripts.build:api:darwin: cd ../LeverAPI && python3 -m PyInstaller --onefile --collect-submodules=dns --hidden-import=engineio.async_drivers.threading --hidden-import=api.discovery --hidden-import=api.device_manager --hidden-import=api.transformers --hidden-import=api.cache --collect-all=orjson --name LeverAPI app.py && cp dist/LeverAPI ../app/macOS/
scripts.build:api:linux: cd ../LeverAPI && python3 -m PyInstaller --onefile --collect-submodules=dns --hidden-import=engineio.async_drivers.threading --hidden-import=api.discovery --hidden-import=api.device_manager --hidden-import=api.transformers --hidden-import=api.cache --collect-all=orjson --name LeverAPI app.py && cp dist/LeverAPI ../app/macOS/
